statements.statement: select * from TT_BIENBANHOICHAN order by BIENBANHOICHAN_ID

select * from TT_BIENBANHOICHAN
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BIENBANHOICHAN_ID = '$BIENBANHOICHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.LOAIHOICHAN = '$LOAIHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.CHANDOAN = '$CHANDOAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TOMTAT_TIENSUBENH = '$TOMTAT_TIENSUBENH$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TIENCAN = '$TIENCAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.KHAMLAMSANG = '$KHAMLAMSANG$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.KPS = '$KPS$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.GPB = '$GPB$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.HINHANHHOC = '$HINHANHHOC$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TUMORMARKER = '$TUMORMARKER$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.CACHXUTRI = '$CACHXUTRI$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.GIAIDOAN = '$GIAIDOAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.CHANDOAN_TUYENDUOI = '$CHANDOAN_TUYENDUOI$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TOMTAT_DIENBIENBENH = '$TOMTAT_DIENBIENBENH$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BENHSU = '$BENHSU$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.HUONGXUTRI = '$HUONGXUTRI$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.CHAMSOC = '$CHAMSOC$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.KETLUAN = '$KETLUAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGAYHOICHAN = '$NGAYHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.THOIGIANDUTINHPT = '$THOIGIANDUTINHPT$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.THOIGIANHENNHAPVIEN = '$THOIGIANHENNHAPVIEN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.SOPHIEUHOICHAN = '$SOPHIEUHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.LOAIHOICHAN_ID = '$LOAIHOICHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.LUUTRU_ID = '$LUUTRU_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BACSI_ID = '$BACSI_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.LYDOHOICHAN_ID = '$LYDOHOICHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.HINHTHUCHOICHAN_ID = '$HINHTHUCHOICHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.YEUCAUHOICHAN = '$YEUCAUHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.THOIGIANHOICHAN = '$THOIGIANHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.PHATDO_DIEUTRI_ID = '$PHATDO_DIEUTRI_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by BIENBANHOICHAN_ID
select * from TT_BIENBANHOICHAN where TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BIENBANHOICHAN_ID = '$value$' order by BIENBANHOICHAN_ID
select * from TT_BIENBANHOICHAN where TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BIENBANHOICHAN_ID = '$BIENBANHOICHAN_ID$' order by BIENBANHOICHAN_ID

insert into TT_BIENBANHOICHAN ( TIEPNHAN_ID , DVYEUCAU_ID , BENHNHAN_ID , LOAIHOICHAN , CHANDOAN , TOMTAT_TIENSUBENH , TIENCAN , KHAMLAMSANG , KPS , TINHTRANG , GPB , HINHANHHOC , TUMORMARKER , CACHXUTRI , GIAIDOAN , CHANDOAN_TUYENDUOI , TOMTAT_DIENBIENBENH , BENHSU , HUONGXUTRI , CHAMSOC , KETLUAN , NGAYHOICHAN , THOIGIANDUTINHPT , THOIGIANHENNHAPVIEN , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , SOPHIEUHOICHAN , LOAIHOICHAN_ID , BENHAN_ID , LUUTRU_ID , PHONGBAN_ID , BACSI_ID , LYDOHOICHAN_ID , HINHTHUCHOICHAN_ID , YEUCAUHOICHAN , THOIGIANHOICHAN , PHATDO_DIEUTRI_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #DVYEUCAU_ID# , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #LOAIHOICHAN# , #CHANDOAN# , #TOMTAT_TIENSUBENH# , #TIENCAN# , #KHAMLAMSANG# , #KPS# , #TINHTRANG# , #GPB# , #HINHANHHOC# , #TUMORMARKER# , #CACHXUTRI# , #GIAIDOAN# , #CHANDOAN_TUYENDUOI# , #TOMTAT_DIENBIENBENH# , #BENHSU# , #HUONGXUTRI# , #CHAMSOC# , #KETLUAN# , #NGAYHOICHAN# , #THOIGIANDUTINHPT# , #THOIGIANHENNHAPVIEN# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #SOPHIEUHOICHAN# , #LOAIHOICHAN_ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #LUUTRU_ID# , #PHONGBAN_ID# , #BACSI_ID# , #LYDOHOICHAN_ID# , #HINHTHUCHOICHAN_ID# , #YEUCAUHOICHAN# , #THOIGIANHOICHAN# , #PHATDO_DIEUTRI_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
statements.update:
update TT_BIENBANHOICHAN set TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , DVYEUCAU_ID = #DVYEUCAU_ID# , BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID# , LOAIHOICHAN = #LOAIHOICHAN# , CHANDOAN = #CHANDOAN# , TOMTAT_TIENSUBENH = #TOMTAT_TIENSUBENH# , TIENCAN = #TIENCAN# , KHAMLAMSANG = #KHAMLAMSANG# , KPS = #KPS# , TINHTRANG = #TINHTRANG# , GPB = #GPB# , HINHANHHOC = #HINHANHHOC# , TUMORMARKER = #TUMORMARKER# , CACHXUTRI = #CACHXUTRI# , GIAIDOAN = #GIAIDOAN# , CHANDOAN_TUYENDUOI = #CHANDOAN_TUYENDUOI# , TOMTAT_DIENBIENBENH = #TOMTAT_DIENBIENBENH# , BENHSU = #BENHSU# , HUONGXUTRI = #HUONGXUTRI# , CHAMSOC = #CHAMSOC# , KETLUAN = #KETLUAN# , NGAYHOICHAN = #NGAYHOICHAN# , THOIGIANDUTINHPT = #THOIGIANDUTINHPT# , THOIGIANHENNHAPVIEN = #THOIGIANHENNHAPVIEN#
, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , SOPHIEUHOICHAN = #SOPHIEUHOICHAN# , LOAIHOICHAN_ID = #LOAIHOICHAN_ID# , BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID# , LUUTRU_ID = #LUUTRU_ID# , PHONGBAN_ID = #PHONGBAN_ID# , BACSI_ID = #BACSI_ID# , LYDOHOICHAN_ID = #LYDOHOICHAN_ID# , HINHTHUCHOICHAN_ID = #HINHTHUCHOICHAN_ID# , YEUCAUHOICHAN = #YEUCAUHOICHAN# , THOIGIANHOICHAN = #THOIGIANHOICHAN# , PHATDO_DIEUTRI_ID = #PHATDO_DIEUTRI_ID#
where BIENBANHOICHAN_ID = '$BIENBANHOICHAN_ID$'
statements.statement:
delete from TT_BIENBANHOICHAN
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BIENBANHOICHAN_ID = '$BIENBANHOICHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.LOAIHOICHAN = '$LOAIHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.CHANDOAN = '$CHANDOAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TOMTAT_TIENSUBENH = '$TOMTAT_TIENSUBENH$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TIENCAN = '$TIENCAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.KHAMLAMSANG = '$KHAMLAMSANG$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.KPS = '$KPS$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TINHTRANG = '$TINHTRANG$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.GPB = '$GPB$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.HINHANHHOC = '$HINHANHHOC$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TUMORMARKER = '$TUMORMARKER$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.CACHXUTRI = '$CACHXUTRI$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.GIAIDOAN = '$GIAIDOAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.CHANDOAN_TUYENDUOI = '$CHANDOAN_TUYENDUOI$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.TOMTAT_DIENBIENBENH = '$TOMTAT_DIENBIENBENH$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BENHSU = '$BENHSU$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.HUONGXUTRI = '$HUONGXUTRI$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.CHAMSOC = '$CHAMSOC$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.KETLUAN = '$KETLUAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGAYHOICHAN = '$NGAYHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.THOIGIANDUTINHPT = '$THOIGIANDUTINHPT$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.THOIGIANHENNHAPVIEN = '$THOIGIANHENNHAPVIEN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.SOPHIEUHOICHAN = '$SOPHIEUHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.LOAIHOICHAN_ID = '$LOAIHOICHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.LUUTRU_ID = '$LUUTRU_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BACSI_ID = '$BACSI_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.LYDOHOICHAN_ID = '$LYDOHOICHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.HINHTHUCHOICHAN_ID = '$HINHTHUCHOICHAN_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.YEUCAUHOICHAN = '$YEUCAUHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.THOIGIANHOICHAN = '$THOIGIANHOICHAN$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.PHATDO_DIEUTRI_ID = '$PHATDO_DIEUTRI_ID$'
TT_BIENBANHOICHAN.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

select ba.SOBENHAN, bbhc.*, isnull(ba.KHOACHUYENDEN_ID, ba.KHOAVAO_ID) as KHOADIEUTRI_ID from TT_BIENBANHOICHAN bbhc
left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ba on bbhc.BENHAN_ID = ba.BENHAN_ID
left join TT_NOITRU_LUUTRU lt on bbhc.LUUTRU_ID = lt.LUUTRU_ID
where bbhc.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and bbhc.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
convert(date, THOIGIANHOICHAN) >= convert(date, '$TUNGAY$')
convert(date, THOIGIANHOICHAN) <= convert(date, '$DENNGAY$')
lt.PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$'
BACSI_ID = '$BACSI_ID$'
order by BIENBANHOICHAN_ID desc
